articles.title: Scotland take Bangladesh's World Cup spot as Pakistan mull pulling out

articles.title: At four, I watched Kosteniuk become World champion; I felt I needed that crown: Assaubayeva
articles.summary: The youngest woman to claim the World Blitz Championship, Assaubayeva has ambitions of winning the prestigious classical title. In this chat, she talks about her beginnings in chess, what achieving the GM title meant to her, why she enjoys playing in India, what she thinks of D. Gukesh and Arjun Erigiaisi, and where Kazakhstan chess is headed
